channel.title: Anyone might help me out of this little problem?whit my 562 client
channel.description:
hello guys i have been looking for someone that can help me out for almost a month now. but nobody can help me out :/
well lets get to the problem. i am trying to make a webclient right. but the client.jar files wont run properly. the only reply i get when i am trying to run it. it's " Could Not find main Class : Client . Program Will Exit. if anyone might help me out i would be happy to get any reply's :)
Thank you for your attention. Contact me on any of these emails ---> [email]amaarzzz.z@hotmail.com[/email] [email]Tf-community@hotmail.com[/email] or feel free to visit my website to talk :) --->[ftp=ftp://www.trinityforce.org]www.trinityforce.org[/ftp]
Clayon.

well lets get to the problem.
i am trying to make a webclient right. but the client.jar files wont run properly.

if anyone might help me out i would be happy to get any reply’s

try the main class as “client” if that doesn’t work then try “client.class”
